Text: 把我<1>恐怖娃娃</1>带回来，而我就会帮你把朋友找出来！
OriginalText: Return my <1>SCARY DOLL</1>, and I will help you find your friends!

Text: 也许 <1>水面上的孩子</1>把它拿去了！
OriginalText: Perhaps a <1>CHILD FROM THE SURFACE</1> has claimed it!

Text: 这是什么？你找出我的 <1>恐怖娃娃</1>了？
OriginalText: Oh, what's this? You have found my <1>SCARY DOLL</1>?

Text: 直到你把它交给我之前，你还不值得我信任！
OriginalText: Until you hand it over, your trust is not earned!

Text: 我能看得出半精灵女儿效法她妈妈的脚步。
OriginalText: I see that the Half-Genie daughter follows in the footsteps of her Genie mother.

Text: 当精灵离开时，我为了这世界害怕。
OriginalText: When the Genies went away, I feared for this world.

Text: 但也许半精灵能翻转邪恶的潮流。
OriginalText: But perhaps the Half-Genies can turn the tides of evil.

Text: 在这门另外一边就是把我关在这儿的赛莲之窝。
OriginalText: Beyond this door you'll find the lair of the Siren who trapped me here.

Text: 而我只能在旁边看着它发生。无奈而无体。
OriginalText: All I could do was watch. Helpless and without form.
The path before you is haunted!

Text: 我得想办法联络上大陆……
OriginalText: Got to contact the mainland somehow...
Oh? You have something for me?
I'll be here if you need me.

Text: 我们护甲村的邻居有提过这件事！
OriginalText: Our neighbors in Armor Town spoke of this!

Text: 沉没城市是个非常复杂的建筑物，而许多部分都被封闭掉。
OriginalText: The Sunken City is a complex structure, and much of it is sealed off.

Text: 我的希望是，若能更了解城市的建设方式……
OriginalText: My hope is that with a better understanding of how the city was built...

Text: ……我就能阻止那些怪兽的进行。
OriginalText: ...I can block the advance of those creatures.

Text: 你知道岛屿底下有怪兽？
OriginalText: You knew there were creatures lurking beneath this island?

Text: 而你还是在这儿建设场馆村？
OriginalText: And you still built Arena Town here?

Text: 这小村本来已经在这儿了。
OriginalText: You see... The town was already here.

Text: 我把它买下来，是为了想创造最绝赞的度假地点。
OriginalText: I purchased it in hopes of creating the ultimate vacation destination.

Text: 价钱低，而他们也真急切的想卖掉。
OriginalText: The cost was low, and they were so eager to sell.

Text: 我甚至把岛屿的名字改掉了。
OriginalText: I even had the island renamed.

Text: 没人会想来赛莲岛度假呢！
OriginalText: No one would want to spend their vacation on Siren Island!

Text: 我知道你不想我去乱找麻烦……
OriginalText: I know you wanted me to stay out of trouble...
...Into the Sunken City beneath the island.

Text: 是我释放了普林可和薇拉。还有砸破！
OriginalText: I was the one who freed Plink and Vera. And Zapple, too!
But... How could you accomplish this?

Text: 其他半精灵使用融合石跟我分享了她们的魔法！
OriginalText: The other Half-Genies used Fusion Stones to share their magic with me!

Text: 而其他两位魔法女孩……她们还在下面吗？
OriginalText: And the other two magical girls... they're still down there?
Young lady, I owe you an apology.

Text: 我小看了你的能力，因为你是最小的。
OriginalText: I underestimated your abilities just because you were the youngest.

Text: 不管使用什么手段，把那些女孩找出来而阻止那些赛莲！
OriginalText: Do whatever it takes to find those girls and <1>STOP</1> those Sirens!

Text: 而我会做我早就该做的事……
OriginalText: I will do what I should have done long ago...
Oh? What's this on the ground?
Whoever dropped this must be awfully hungry!
You said you came here to steal the city!
Then you leave me little choice!
I'll get you out of there.

Text: 普林可、薇拉、和砸破安心回到家了。
OriginalText: Plink, Vera, and Zapple are home safe.
I still need to find Fillin.

Text: 她跟我说她名字叫乖乖。
OriginalText: She told me her name was Ima.

Text: 我一见她就知道了，但她感觉好像需要朋友。
OriginalText: I knew right away, but she seemed to need a friend.

Text: 现在因为我，她也被混进这一堆乱。
OriginalText: Now because of me she's mixed up in this madness.
I have to get her back!
It bears the marking of a <1>SEA FROG</1>!

Text: 海蛙是住在岛屿上很少见的生物。
OriginalText: Sea Frogs are rare creatures that inhabit this island.

Text: 它们能使用高速度游过咸水！
OriginalText: They can swim through salt water at super high speeds!

Text: 使用者它能力，你也许就能找出这地方<1>邪恶的的来源</1>！
OriginalText: By using its abilities, you may be able to locate the <1>SOURCE OF EVIL</1> in this place!

Text:
在深水中，按<IB action=Down/>来游泳！
若想减速，按住<IB action=Attack/>！
OriginalText:
When in deep water, simply press <IB action=Down/> to swim!
If you need to slow down, hold <IB action=Attack/>!

Text: 在深水中，按下按钮来游泳！若想减速，按住(!)按钮！
OriginalText: When in deep water, simply press down to swim! If you need to slow down, hold the (!) button.

Text:
在深水中，按<IB action=Down/>来游泳！
若想减速，按住<IB action=Attack/>！
OriginalText:
When in deep water, simply press <IB action=Down/> to swim!
If you need to slow down, hold <IB action=Attack/>!

Text: 在深水中，按下按钮来游泳！若想减速，按住(!)按钮！
OriginalText: When in deep water, simply press down to swim! If you need to slow down, hold the (!) button.

Text: 阻止她们，免得她们把我东西弄坏！
OriginalText: Stop them before they break my stuff!

Text: 哇，那<1>海蛙</1>魔法真有用呢！
OriginalText: Boy, that <1>SEA FROG</1> Magic sure came in handy!

Text: 我从来没想到我能这样变形！
OriginalText: I never knew I could transform like that!

Text: 你能做的比你想象的多！
OriginalText: You're capable of much more than you know!
It was a gift from my mother.

Text: 其实是我们所有的妈妈一起送的。
OriginalText: From ALL of our mothers, really.

Text: 她们离开们回去她们的世界之前，每一位精灵都有留言。
OriginalText: Before they left for their own realm, each Genie wrote something down.
It's full of memories, bits of advice...

Text: 所有她们想跟我们分享的东西。
OriginalText: All of the things they wanted to share with us.

Text: 她们就把书交给我因为我是最大的。
OriginalText: Since I was the oldest, they left the book in my care.
I'd hoped that by visiting this island...

Text: ……我就终于能跟你们其他半精灵分享呢！
OriginalText: ...I'd finally be able to share it with other Half-Genies like you!
There's a message for ME in there?
Then count on me to help!

Text: 若有任何我能帮的事，就请问！
OriginalText: If there's anything I can do, just ask!
Asking for help is kinda hard...

Text: 普林可、薇拉、和砸破都用了融合石跟我合并能力。
OriginalText: Plink, Vera, and Zapple used Fusion Stones to merge their powers with me.

Text: 她们的魔法帮助我救出你。
OriginalText: Their magic helped me rescue you.
Would you share your magic with me, too?

Text: 请教帮忙一定才是最难的挑战。
OriginalText: Asking for help must be the toughest challenge of all!

Text: 好啊， 我很开心跟你分享我的能力。
OriginalText: Sure, I'd be happy to share my abilities with you.

Text: 可是，我们需要一块<1>融合石</1>！
OriginalText: But for that, we'll need a <1>FUSION STONE</1>!
We'd better start searching for one!

Text: 你的朋友很有趣呢。他说你的寻求需要精灵魔法。
OriginalText: Your friend here is very interesting. She says you need <1>GENIE MAGIC</1> for your quest.

Text: 我个人是没有魔法，但再往更深下去，到海底有一位。
OriginalText: I do not have any of my own, but there is someone deeper down, at the bottom of the sea.

Text: 这邋遢的老鬼也许能帮助你。
OriginalText: This <1>MANGY OLD GHOST</1> might be able to help you.

Text: 走到<1>海底</1>，你很快就会找出你所寻找的。
OriginalText: Travel to the <1>OCEAN FLOOR</1>, and you will soon find that which you seek!
A <1>DOG COLLAR</1>? May I see it?
The stone pendant is a <1>FUSION STONE</1>!

Text: 最好把它给你红头发的朋友！
OriginalText: Best to give that to your red-haired friend!

Text: 我叫她不要随着声音呢！
OriginalText: I told her not to follow voices.

Text: 还在海底，但没有我们这么深！
OriginalText: Still undersea, but not so deep as we are now!

Text: 去吧！去上面矿山找你朋友……
OriginalText: Go! Find your friend in the <1>MINES ABOVE</1>...
...and give her the <1>FUSION STONE</1> that you hold!

Text: 去吧！去上面的矿山找你朋友……
OriginalText: Go! Find your friend in the <1>MINES ABOVE</1>...
...and give her the <1>FUSION STONE</1> that you hold!
The other still hides in the mines!
Back to the <1>GHOST DOG</1> with you!

Text: 你把电源恢复到那<1>棒子</1>了吗？
可是你不知道要带去哪儿，是吗？
OriginalText: But you don't know where to take it, do you?

Text: <1>深海底</1>里的<1>控制室</1>是你的目标！
OriginalText: The <1>CONTROL ROOM</1> in <1>DEEP SEA</1> is your goal!

Text: 试试看往鬼狗<1>上面三楼</1>！
OriginalText: Try <1>THREE FLOORS UP</1> from the Ghost Dog!

Text: 也许东边的实验室能服务你最好！
OriginalText: Perhaps the <1>SCIENCE LAB</1> to the <1>EAST</1> will serve you best!

Text: 在上面的矿山使用你的震撼舞！
OriginalText: Use your <1>QUAKE DANCE</1> in the <1>MINES</1> above!
Welcome to the very <1>BOTTOM OF THE SEA</1>.
I am a lowly ghost dog.

Text: 我在拯救我朋友的寻求中。
OriginalText: I'm on a quest to rescue my friend.

Text: 你的朋友一定在这封闭的门另外一边。
OriginalText: Your friend must be trapped beyond this seal.
In order to open the hatch...

Text: 就得恢复整个城市的电源！
OriginalText: You would need to <1>RESTORE POWER</1> to the city!
I'm not afraid of the Seven Sirens!

Text: 我已经面对了四个～而且都胜利！
OriginalText: I've already faced four of them - and won!

Text: 地下的赛莲有<1>无尽的数量</1>！
OriginalText: The Sirens below are <1>ENDLESS IN NUMBER</1>!

Text: 我不管有七个赛莲，还是七百个！
OriginalText: Well, I don't care if there are seven Sirens, or seven hundred!

Text: 你愿意风险所有，为了救出你朋友？
OriginalText: Would you risk <1>EVERYTHING</1> to save your friend?
Good. It must never be opened!

Text: 很久以前，这岛屿的守护者藏了<1>两个手环</1>在上面的<1>矿山</1>。
OriginalText: Long ago, the guardian of this island hid  <1>TWO BRACELETS</1> in the <1>MINES</1> up above.

Text: 这些手环就是把城市叫醒的<1>钥匙</1>。
OriginalText: These bracelets are the <1>KEY</1> to waking the city.

Text: 把它们找出来，而带来给我。
OriginalText: Find them, and bring them to me.

Text: 把那狗颈圈拿去给鬼长辈看。
OriginalText: Show that <1>DOG COLLAR</1> to the <1>GHOST ELDER</1>.
She will know how to use it.
There is a <1>WARP ROOM</1> up above, to the right.

Text: 你可以使用来直接去到她那里！
OriginalText: You can use it to reach her directly!

Text: 若要叫醒城市，你得带来两个手环给我。
OriginalText: To wake the city, bring me <1>TWO BRACELETS</1>.

Text: 谢谢。我看到你有引发地震的能力。
OriginalText: Thank you. I see you have the power to create <1>EARTHQUAKES</1>.

Text: 请使用你的能力帮我找出我主人的手环。
OriginalText: Please use your power to find my master’s <1>BRACELETS</1>.

Text: 你把手环带来了！我可以闻闻看吗？
OriginalText: You brought the <1>BRACELETS</1>! May I sniff them?

Text: 但我闻起来全是谎言和欺骗。
OriginalText: But I reek of lies and deception.
...I am not truly a ghost dog.

Text: 在人生中，我是个守护精灵。
OriginalText: In life I was a Guardian Genie.

Text: 我的责任就是保护这岛屿。
OriginalText: My job was to protect this island.

Text: 但七赛莲来的时候，我无法拯救我的人民。
OriginalText: But when the <1>SEVEN SIRENS</1> came, I was unable to save my people.

Text: 我认为我把赛莲永远关走了，所以我把她们的电棒折成两段。
OriginalText: Thinking I’d trapped the Sirens for good, I took their <1>POWER ROD</1> and broke it into two parts.

Text: 我把这两块藏在矿山里，只有我震撼魔法能把它们找出来。
OriginalText: I hid the pieces in the mines where only my Quake Magic could find them.

Text: 这样，赛莲从此以后就不再能开她们的船了。
OriginalText: This way, the Sirens could never again <1>POWER THEIR VESSEL</1>.
You have learned the secret of this island.

Text: 现在，我会把<1>两个手环</1>并起来，重新构成<1>电棒</1>。
OriginalText: Now, I will combine the <1>TWO BRACELETS</1> to form the <1>POWER ROD</1> once more.

Text: 虽然我把她们关注了，我不够强力打败掉那些赛莲。
OriginalText: Though I had them trapped, I was not powerful enough to defeat the Sirens.

Text: 我和她们队长，第七个赛莲，战斗而输了。
OriginalText: I battled their leader, the <1>SEVENTH SIREN</1> and lost.

Text: 我跌下去之前唯一能做的是把她肉体形象偷走。
OriginalText: All I could do is rob her of her physical form before I fell.

Text: 许多年来，我留在这鬼的形象待在下面这里。
OriginalText: For many years I have remained down below as a <1>GHOST</1>.

Text: 经过了这些时间，我只能无奈地看赛莲把我的人民引诱下去深处遇见命运。
OriginalText: In all that time, I have watched helplessly as the Sirens lured my people down into the depths to meet their fate.

Text: 我希望你能把这一切的乱象终止掉。
OriginalText: I want you to <1>PUT AN END</1> to this madness.

Text: 把那电棒拿去，而重新启动赛莲的船。把它航到遥远的地方。
OriginalText: Take that <1>POWER ROD</1>, and re-activate the Siren’s <1>VESSEL</1>. Sail it away.

Text: 带去赛莲无法伤害任何人的地方。
OriginalText: Take it someplace where the Sirens won’t be able to harm anyone ever again.

Text: 现在，我永远会继续做个癞皮狗。
OriginalText: Now, I will remain a mangy dog.

Text: 在目前的状态一下，电棒是没有用的……
OriginalText: In its current state, the <1>POWER ROD</1> is useless.

Text: 你得想办法恢复棒子的电源……
OriginalText: You must <1>RESTORE POWER</1> to the rod somehow...

Text: ……而再带去我们上面的控制室！
OriginalText: ...And then, take it to the <1>CONTROL ROOM</1> directly above us!

Text: 也许有科学头脑的人可以协助你。
OriginalText: Perhaps a person with a scientific mind can lend assistance.

Text: 没有办法知道真正有多少个赛莲！
OriginalText: There is no telling how many of the Sirens there truly are!
Please take it to the <1>CONTRL ROOM</1>.

Text: 按照你的<1>地图</1>，在我们上面三楼！
OriginalText: According to your <1>MAP</1>, it is three decks above us!

Text: 看来得先把电源开起来才能开这个。
OriginalText: Looks like the power has to be on before this thing will open.

Text: 这现在应该可以使用了！
我听到声音，隨着他们过来。
OriginalText: I heard voices and followed them here.
But they seem to have vanished.

Text: 有了这最终的能力，你就会成为<1>壮观超级星光超精灵</1>！
OriginalText: With this final power, you'll become a <1>SPECTACULAR SUPERSTAR SUPER GENIE</1>!
Just tell me when you're ready, ok?

Text: <1>震撼舞</1>能<1>移动地</1>！也能给敌人重大的损害！
OriginalText: The <1>QUAKE DANCE</1> can <1>SHIFT THE EARTH</1>! It also deals significant damage to enemies!

Text: （跳到图标出现，再按<IB action=Down/>来启动魔法！）
OriginalText: (Dance until you see the icon appear, then press  <IB action=Down/> to activate the magic!)

Text: （跳到图标出现，再点按<I anim=ui_game:ios_dance_buttons.anb seq=icon_quake scale=0.5 width=0.7 offsetx=0.35 offsety=0.43>来启动魔法！）
OriginalText: (Dance until you see the icon appear, then touch <I anim=ui_game:ios_dance_buttons.anb seq=icon_quake scale=0.5 width=0.7 offsetx=0.35 offsety=0.43> to activate the magic!)

Text: <1>震撼舞</1>能<1>移动地</1>！也能给敌人重大的损害！
OriginalText: The <1>QUAKE DANCE</1> can <1>SHIFT THE EARTH</1>! It also deals significant damage to enemies!
Try using it in this room!
The <1>QUAKE DANCE</1> can move mountains! Give it a try!

Text: 我想你该带去给那<1>鬼狗</1>！
OriginalText: I guess you should take them to that <1>GHOST DOG</1>!

Text: 最好带去给那只癞皮狗！
OriginalText: Better take those to the <1>MANGY GHOST DOG</1>.
This spirit claims to know you!
She's the one who helped me find you!

Text: 老太太，我欠你我生命呢！
OriginalText: Old one, it seems I owe you my very life!

Text: 其实我也许还能多帮助你们！
OriginalText: In fact I may be of more use still!

Text: 你说你还需要<1>最后一块融合石</1>啊？
OriginalText: You say you need <1>ONE LAST FUSION STONE</1>?

Text: 你知道能在哪里找到吗？
OriginalText: Do you know where we can find it?
At the bottom of the sea!

Text: 在那儿，你会遇到一位也许能帮你的人！
OriginalText: There you'll find someone who may be able to help!

Text: 往下到<1>海床</1>，而我确定你就能找出你寻找的。
OriginalText: Travel to the <1>OCEAN FLOOR</1>, and I'm sure you'll find that which you seek.

Text: 为何不试试看使用那<1>青蛙</1>能力潜得更深呢？
OriginalText: Why not try using that <1>FROG</1> ability to dive even deeper?

Text: 但我又找出一块融合石！
OriginalText: But I did manage to find a Fusion Stone!
It was a gift from a Ghost Dog!

Text: 有人说这附近埋了<1>两个手环</1>。
OriginalText: It said there were <1>TWO BRACELETS</1> buried around here.

Text: 那我知道我能怎么帮你。
OriginalText: In that case I know just how to help.

Text: 就是把我们魔法并起来！

OriginalText: Are you ready to do this?

Text: 我好像引起了某个安全装置。
OriginalText: I must have tripped some kind of security device.

Text: 我是在随着奇怪的能源读数就带了我到这房间。
OriginalText: I was following a strange energy reading that lead me to this room.

Text: 似乎是从墙壁里这小端口发出的。
OriginalText: It seems to be coming from this small port in the wall.

Text: 若有对的工具，我们也许能从这端口 <1>虹吸能源</1>出来！
OriginalText: Huh. With the right tool, we could <1>SIPHON ENERGY</1> from here!

Text: 喔，我可以看看那无电的棒子吗？
OriginalText: Oh! Can I see that unpowered <1>ROD</1>?

Text: 若你需要我<1>科学头脑</1>就会来找我！
OriginalText: Come see me if you need the help of my <1>SCIENTIFIC MIND</1>!

Text: 这棒子看来刚好适合这端口呢！
OriginalText: This rod looks like it would fit perfectly!

Text: 会不会是某种燃料容器呢？
OriginalText: Could it be some kind of fuel container?

Text: 我们插进去来看看，好吗？
OriginalText: Let's plug it in and find out, shall we?

Text: 那棒子现在脉动，传着非常多的能源！
OriginalText: That rod is now pulsing with an enormous amount of power!

Text: 我不骗你的。很多的电力！
OriginalText: I'm not kidding. That's a lot of juice!

Text: 我们扫描注意到了<1>深海底</1>有一间<1>控制室</1>。
OriginalText: Our scans picked up a <1>CONTROL ROOM</1> in the <1>DEEP SEA</1> zone.

Text: 也许你应该把电棒带去那儿！
OriginalText: Perhaps you should take the power rod there!

Text: 我若像妳一样有个<1>地图</1>，我会经常查看我的<1>子屏幕</1>!
OriginalText: I'll mark the locations on your <1>MAP</1>!

Text: 我们扫描注意到了<1>深海底</1>有一间<1>控制室</1>。
OriginalText: Our scans picked up a <1>CONTROL ROOM</1> in the <1>DEEP SEA</1> zone.

Text: 也许你应该把电棒带去那儿！
OriginalText: Perhaps you should take the power rod there!

Text: 救命！我好像引起了某种安全装置！我被卡住了！
OriginalText: Help! I seem to have tripped some sort of security device! I'm stuck!
Stay put! I'll get you out!

Text: 当核心电力达到极大容量……
OriginalText: When the Core Power reaches its max capacity...
...the release valve needs to be opened.

Text: 这样，电源才能往城市继续流。
OriginalText: That way the energy can flow out into the rest of the city.

Text: 若核心在紧要时间没有开……
OriginalText: If the valve isn't opened by the time the Core goes critical...
So you need to find that switch...
Are you ready to do this?
Ok, let me know when you're ready.

Text: 我和菠萝会待在这里顾好电源流量。
OriginalText: Bolo and I will stay here to regulate the energy flow.

Text: 找出那控制开关，抓好洛蒂……
OriginalText: Find that control switch, grab Rotty...

Text: 这看起来就像天天再说的开关！
OriginalText: This looks like the switch Sky was taking about!

Text: 一定有什么方法能让<1>电力</1>进到这控制台！
OriginalText: There must be some way get <1>ELECTRICITY</1> to this control panel!
Activate the Power Core release valve?

Text: 我就知道你会来到这儿。

OriginalText: Risky! You need to turn back!

Text: 不久，我的工人就会修理完成。
OriginalText: Soon my men will complete their repairs.

Text: 而这城市完全的控制就会是我的！
OriginalText: And the power of this city will belong to me!

Text: 瑞士起靴子，七海之女王！
OriginalText: Risky Boots, Queen of the Seven Seas!

Text: 这一定不是好事！我得快想办法！
OriginalText: This can't be good! I've got to do something!

Text: 而你为什么假装成半精灵呢？
OriginalText: And why were you pretending to be a Half-Genie?

Text: 你打算去度假把我留在家呢！
OriginalText: You planned to go on vacation and leave me behind!

Text: 所以我藏在你的行李箱里偷渡来的！
OriginalText: So I hid in the luggage and stowed away!

Text: 而我打扮成精灵是为了能参加好玩的活动！
OriginalText: And I dressed like a genie so I'd be included in the fun stuff!

Text: 我没邀请你是因为找不到你呢。
OriginalText: I didn't invite you because I couldn't find you.

Text: 大概是因为你你藏在我行李箱里。
OriginalText: Probably because you were hiding in the luggage!
That does kind of make sense!

Text: 哇，你其实有打算要邀请我啊！
OriginalText: Awwww, you were going to invite me after all!

Text: 是啊，不过……我以后可能会重新考虑呢！
OriginalText: Yeah, well... I'll probably reconsider in the future!

Text: 那硬币上有<1>喷射章鱼</1>的符号！
OriginalText: That coin bears the mark of a <1>JET OCTO</1>!

Text: 喷射章鱼是住在岛屿上很少见的生物。
OriginalText: Jet Octos are rare creatures that inhabit this island.

Text: 他们不会游泳，但能使用着墨汽在空中里喷射。
OriginalText: They can’t swim, but they can boost through the air on jets of ink vapor.

Text: 使用着它能力，你也许能找出这地方<1>邪恶的来源</1>！
OriginalText: Using its abilities, you may be able to locate the <1>SOURCE OF EVIL</1> in this place!

Text: 在半空中按<IB action=Jump/>就能二段或三段跳！试试看吧！
OriginalText: Press <IB action=Jump/> in air to get a <1>DOUBLE</1> or <1>TRIPLE</1> jump! Give it a shot!

Text: 在半空中点按<I anim=ui_global:ios_button_jump.anb seq=Default scale=0.3>来二段或三段跳！试试看！
OriginalText: Tap the  <I anim=ui_global:ios_button_jump.anb seq=Default scale=0.3> button in air to get a <1>DOUBLE</1> or <1>TRIPLE</1> jump! Give it a shot!

Text: 在半空中按<IB action=Jump/>就能二段或三段跳！试试看吧！
OriginalText: Press <IB action=Jump/> in air to get a <1>DOUBLE</1> or <1>TRIPLE</1> jump! Give it a shot!

Text: 在半空中点按<I anim=ui_global:ios_button_jump.anb seq=Default scale=0.3>来二段或三段跳！试试看！
OriginalText: Tap the  <I anim=ui_global:ios_button_jump.anb seq=Default scale=0.3> button in air to get a <1>DOUBLE</1> or <1>TRIPLE</1> jump! Give it a shot!

Text: 这是什么啊？看来好像缺了一块东西。
OriginalText: What is this? Looks like a piece is missing.

Text: 这控制台有圆形的开口。
OriginalText: There is a circular opening in this panel.

Text: 我是否应该插进电棒呢？

OriginalText: Shantae, is that your voice I hear?

Text: 好奇怪的机器刚从地上升出来！
OriginalText: A strange machine just rose up from the ground!
Almost knocked me right off my feet!

Text: 嗯……好想连到地下的城市。
OriginalText: Hmm... seems to be connected to the city below.

Text: 有某种控制台，上面有圆形的显示屏。
OriginalText: Some kind of control console with a round display.

Text: 我正在使用着跟你联络呢。
OriginalText: I'm using it to communicate with you.

Text: 我在这下面也在看同类的东西！
OriginalText: I'm looking at something similar down here!
The city isn't a city at all.

Text: 我猜这船就是瑞士起这整个时间的目标！
OriginalText: I think this ship is what Risky has been after all along!
Rottytops is trapped down here, too!

Text: 我得进行<1>最后一个救援任务</1>！
OriginalText: I need to mount <1>ONE LAST RESCUE</1>!

Text: 我在我控制台上看得见气塞的图标。
OriginalText: I can see an image of an airlock on my panel.
Maybe there's a way to open it!

Text: 你那边有没有开关或是杠杆？
OriginalText: Is there a switch or lever on your side?
Ok. Now, before you pull it...
WHOOAAAHH! IT IS CRUSHING MY BONES!
Just kidding. But, that could have really happened!

Text: 我想我有办法送进人来帮你！
OriginalText: According to my screen, you have just opened some sort of docking bay.
I will send help to you. Head to the city's lowest point!

Text: 这控制台从空中突然跑出来！
OriginalText: This Control Panel popped up out of nowhere!

Text: 我想也许那些<1>科学家</1>能帮助你解开这奥秘……
OriginalText: I bet those <1>SCIENTISTS</1> could help solve this mystery...
Looks like the power is on!

Text: 你们大家怎么都在这里？
OriginalText: What are you all doing down here?

Text: 你叔叔要求了我们马上把你朋友带来这里！
OriginalText: Your uncle requested that we bring your friends here at once!

Text: 他们有个非常重要的任务！
OriginalText: They have a very important mission!

Text: 对啊，按照你叔叔，秘密克先生说的……
OriginalText: Yes, according to your uncle, Mister Mimic...

Text: 你的动作把岛屿底下的<1>核心电力</1>重新启动了。
OriginalText: Whatever you did reactivated the <1>POWER CORE</1> beneath this island.

Text: 很快就会热到危险的地步！
OriginalText: It will soon heat up to dangerous levels!
I'm sorry, but I had to!

Text: 是我唯一能救出洛蒂的机会！
OriginalText: It's my only chance to save Rotty!
Ugh! Do not get me started about Rottytops!

Text: 我猜这一切都是她的错！
OriginalText: I'm sure this is all her fault, somehow!

Text: 我很抱歉把你们三个人都混进这一托乱！
OriginalText: I'm sorry I got you three mixed up in all this!

Text: 是的！我们才不会错过呢！
OriginalText: Yes! We wouldn't miss this for the world!

Text: 光站在这里已经是梦想成真了！
OriginalText: Just standing here is a dream come true!
Best to catch up to your friends!

Text: 幸好你们都安心的出来了！
OriginalText: I'm so glad you all made it out safely!

Text: 我想你们都想念了我，是吗？
OriginalText: Bet you guys missed me, huh?

Text: 哇，那章鱼形式真是有用！
OriginalText: Boy, that <1>OCTO FORM</1> sure came in handy!
YOU'VE GOT SOME EXPLAINING TO DO!!!
WHAT EXACTLY WAS THAT BACK THERE?!!
Don't you give me that malarkey!

Text: 超级正妹在脑海里待着？！？
OriginalText: RADICAL HOT BABE CHILLIN’ OUT IN THE BRAIN JUICE?!?
Why does that sound so familiar?
And that makes YOU the BAD GUY!

Text: 你为何不就直爆炸破成那种巨大、白色……
OriginalText: Why don't you just explode into one of those huge, white...

Text: …….清屏幕的爆破，你既然那么爱！
OriginalText: ...screen clearing blasts that you love so much!

Text: 说实在，你为何不就跟清屏幕爆破结婚呢！
OriginalText: In fact, why don't you and the Screen Clearing Blast get married!

Text: 所以你就能生出清屏幕爆破娃娃！
OriginalText: So you can have Screen Clearing Blast BABIES!

Text: 而且去住农场，不断的爆炸……
OriginalText: And go live on a farm that's constantly EXPLODING...

Text: 这不是最后一次见面的，小姐！
OriginalText: You haven't seen the last of me, lady!

Text: 好吧，我得去接我姐姐的孩子。
OriginalText: Anyhoo, I gotta go pick up my sister's kids.

Text: 若你看到他们，请告诉我！
OriginalText: Let me know if you see any of 'em!
We've got to get aboard the <1>METAL FISH</1>, fast!

Text: 趁赛莲还没发现她们主要的控制系统已经上线了！
OriginalText: Before those Sirens realize that their main control systems are back on line!
I just want to say that...

Text: 我真的很抱歉偷渡过来。
OriginalText: I'm really sorry about stowing away.

Text: 我应该知道你会邀请我的。
OriginalText: I should have known you'd invite me.

Text: 你可以待会儿在道歉啊，洛蒂。
你能使用你进来的方式出去吗？
OriginalText: Can you get out the way you came in?

Text: 你们搭着铁鱼快逃出去吧！
OriginalText: You guys take the Metal Fish and get out of here!

Text: 那些塔从地上直接升起来！
OriginalText: Those towers rose up right out of the ground!

Text: 而这是我之前在讲的控制台！
OriginalText: And this is the control panel I was talking about before!

Text: 我按了上面每一个按钮，但没有任何事情发生！
OriginalText: I pushed every button on it, but nothing happened!

Text: 你再按一次我就把你绑起来！
OriginalText: Touch it again and I’ll hogtie you!

Text: 这一切都是瑞士起靴子做的！
她骗了我来恢复控制系统的电力。
OriginalText: She tricked me into restoring power to the control systems.

Text: 而现在她使用这些<1>塔</1>来发电给<1>引擎</1>！
OriginalText: And now she's using these <1>TOWERS</1> to power up the <1>ENGINES</1>!

Text: 沉没城市怎么会需要引擎呢？
OriginalText: Why would a sunken city need engines?

Text: 因为这城市根本不是城市呢！
OriginalText: Because this city isn't a city at all!

Text: 是的！而瑞士起靴子想把它充电起来启航走！
OriginalText: Yes! And <1>RISKY BOOTS</1> is trying to power it up and sail away with it!

Text: 真不可思议！船怎么会卡在岛屿底下呢？
OriginalText: Unthinkable! How would a ship come to be stuck beneath the island?

Text: 不管原来是怎么卡在那儿，移动这船对这岛屿来说不可能是好事。
OriginalText: However it got there, moving this ship can't be good for the health of this island.
When the ship tears free of the earth...

Text: 我的家就会被破坏掉了！

OriginalText: ...it won't be long before the ship reaches <1>FULL POWER</1>.

Text: 目前，桑塔一个人有我们全部的魔法能力！
OriginalText: As it stands, Shantae carries <1>ALL</1> of our magical powers!

Text: 我就把魔法恢复给你们，而我们就能一起对战！
OriginalText: I'll just return your magic, and we can all fight together!

Text: 直到目前，你的本能已经都帮助了我们了很多。
OriginalText: Your instincts have served us well to this point!

Text: 这任务是要给壮观半精灵超级明星！
OriginalText: This is a job for a <1>SPECTACULAR HALF-GENIE SUPERSTAR</1>!
And where can I get one?

Text: 这是在恐吓我乡村的怪兽？
OriginalText: This is the creature that's been terrifying my village?
I think she's trying to speak!
It sounds like she wants to help!

Text: 你是在说你想帮我们，是吗？
OriginalText: You're saying you want to help us, right?

Text: 除非她知道怎么把那些能源塔停机……
OriginalText: Unless she knows how to shut down those energy towers...
...any help from her is too little, too late!

Text: 与此同时，你的任务很清楚呢……
把<1>全部四塔</1>关机，趁还有时间时！
OriginalText: Shut down <1>ALL FOUR TOWERS</1> while there's still time!

Text: 释放那些怪兽根本一直就是你的目标！
OriginalText: Releasing those creatures was part of your plan all along!

Text: 这些<1>能源收集塔</1>将会收集<1>太阳光</1>……
OriginalText: These <1>ENERGY COLLECTOR TOWERS</1> will collect the <1>SUN'S RAYS</1>...

Text: ……而把它转换成<1>燃料</1>给<1>船的引擎</1>！
OriginalText: ...And convert them to <1>FUEL</1> for the the <1>SHIP'S ENGINES</1>!

Text: 而七赛莲曾经掌握过的能力……
OriginalText: The Power that once belonged to the <1>SEVEN SIRENS</1>...

Text: 那些能源收集塔听起来很糟糕呢！
OriginalText: Those <1>ENERGY COLLECTOR TOWERS</1> sound like real bad news!
I don't know what you're talking about...
But the path isn't blocked anymore!
Then let's get <1>BACK TO THE SURFACE</1>, fast!!

Text: 你得趁还有时间快毁灭掉<1>全部四座塔</1>！
OriginalText: You must destroy <1>ALL FOUR TOWERS</1> while there's still time!

Text: 尽力<1>毁灭掉那飞船</1>，防止它<1>射击</1>！
OriginalText: Do whatever it takes to <1>DESTROY THAT AIRSHIP</1> before it can <1>FIRE</1>!

Text: 现在来<1>第二个能源收集器</1>！
两个能源收集器解决了！
现在来<1>第三个能源收集器</1>！
还剩下一个<1>能源收集器</1>！
OriginalText: One more <1>ENERGY COLLECTOR TOWER</1> to go!

Text: 我们都知道你做得到！啊，你成功了吗？
OriginalText: I knew you could do it! Um, did you?

Text: 嗯。全部四个能源收集器都拆下了。
OriginalText: Yeah. All four energy collectors are down for the count.

Text: 那应该就会停住能源往城市的流量。
OriginalText: That should stop the flow of power into the city.

Text: 若是真的，那这怎么解释？
OriginalText: If that’s true, then how do you explain this?
The city really was a ship!
With Risky Boots at the helm!

Text: 她火炮直接对着这岛屿！
OriginalText: Her cannon's aimed right at the island!
We need a plan, and fast!

Text: 我们得把桑塔放进那船里面。
OriginalText: We've got to get Shantae inside that ship.

Text: 好啊，显示给我们看你能做些什么！
OriginalText: Ok, show us what you can do!

Text: 她召唤出了某种运输器。
OriginalText: She's summoned some sort of <1>TRANSPORT DEVICE</1>.
She has the ability to teleport things!

Text: 赛莲使用了她能力在半精灵节目中把半精灵扭曲走。
OriginalText: The Sirens used her to warp away the Half-Genies during the Half-Genie Festival.

Text: 现在她想帮我们一劳永逸地阻止赛莲！
OriginalText: Now she wants to help us stop the Sirens once and for all!

Text: 你光听着她吵闹尖叫就了解了这么多啊？
OriginalText: You got all that from a few annoying screeches?

Text: 龙虾女孩感觉还不错耶。
到该去面对瑞士起靴子的时间了！
OriginalText: It's time for you to go and confront Risky Boots!

Text: 你得尽力<1>毁灭那飞船</1>防止它<1>射击</1>！
OriginalText: You must do whatever it takes to <1>DESTROY THAT AIRSHIP</1> before it can <1>FIRE</1>!

Text: 看来你找到你的朋友了！
OriginalText: By the look of things, you must have found your friend!

Text: 你有<1>震撼魔法</1>，跟我一样！
OriginalText: You have <1>QUAKE MAGIC</1> just like mine!

Text: 你怎么会有这个能力呢？
OriginalText: How did you come by such a gift?

Text: 我还以为只有我和我女儿才有这种魔法呢。
OriginalText: I thought that only myself, and my daughter had such magic.
I feel very unsafe right now!

Text: 那是全部四个。该回场馆村了！
OriginalText: That's all four. Time to get back to Arena Town!

Text: 不只这样！而且她也救了瑞士起靴子。
OriginalText: Not only that! She saved Risky Boots as well.
Because Shantae’s a good guy, that’s why!

Text: 是啊，我们每一位都恢复像新一样！
OriginalText: Yes, every one of us is fully restored and good as new!
But I can't tell if she's...

Text: 别拿你肮脏的手来碰我！
OriginalText: Get your filthy hands off me!
And all of you better back off right now!

Text: 甚至你试着把我们都爆炸之后。
OriginalText: Even after you tried to blow all of us up.

Text: 她只是在扮演她的角色而已。
OriginalText: The runt was just playing the part I gave her.

Text: 我建设半精灵節慶是为了把你们全部都带来……
OriginalText: I created the Half-Genie festival to lure you all here...

Text: ……好让皇后以这五位傻瓜为食。
OriginalText: ...so that the Empress could feed on those other five fools.

Text: 我说服了她说你的生命力是抵挡的。
OriginalText: I'd convinced her that the runt's life force was inferior and tainted.

Text: 看你舞台上的表演，这的确一点都不难相信。
OriginalText: Not a difficult task given her performance on stage.
You were merely the ace up my sleeve.

Text: 只是为了以防皇后试着用诡计占上风。
OriginalText: I kept you nearby in case the Empress tried to pull a fast one.

Text: 但你像个幼稚的孩子一样，一直打扰了我！
OriginalText: But like a childish oaf you kept getting in my way!

Text: 我需要把这些笨蛋关在笼子够久好让我能能吸收全部五位适合分量的生命！
OriginalText: I needed to keep these fools caged long enough to drain <1>ALL FIVE</1> in the proper amounts!

Text: 五滴纯粹的半精灵生命力，他真的就会变所向无敌。
OriginalText: Five <1>ACTUAL</1> drops of Half-Genie Life Force, and she really <1>WOULD</1> have become invincible.
Hey! That makes me a hero!
I figured once I had the ship...

Text: 我就能把那皇后和剩下赛莲爆炸成果冻潭。
OriginalText: I'd blast the Empress and whatever's left of those Sirens into quivering puddles of jelly.

Text: 这一切，只是为了一艘新船？！
OriginalText: All this so you could get yourself a <1>SHIP</1>?!
I'm the Queen of the Seven Seas!

Text: 我值得拥有最佳的所有！

OriginalText: You got rid of those Sirens.

Text: 我也拿到了我的新飞船。
上面千万不准有任何刮伤，要不然你们大家都得付出代价！
OriginalText: There had better not be a <1>SCRATCH</1> on it or you'll ALL pay dearly!

Text: 你为什么总是那么自私？！
OriginalText: Why do you always have to be so selfish?!

Text: 我一直希望你会改过自新！
OriginalText: I keep hoping against hope that you'll turn over a new leaf!

Text: 而不知何故，我们能想办法当作一队来合作！
OriginalText: That someday we can work together as a <1>TEAM</1>!!
And make it extra hot this time!
Don't you dare leave without me!

Text: 她发现船的情况时一定不会很开心。
OriginalText: She won't be happy when she finds out about the ship.

Text: 那既然解决了，我们现在应该确认大家没事。
OriginalText: With that behind us, we should make sure everyone's alright.

Text: 城市里的场馆多半都毁了。
OriginalText: The arena back in town is pretty much ruined.

Text: 可是还有时间找别的场地主办半精灵节！
OriginalText: But there’s still time to host the Half-Genie Festival somewhere else!

Text: 你真的想重新开始节庆？
OriginalText: You seriously want to resume the festival?

Text: 我们可以把节庆移到树村！
OriginalText: We could move the festival to Tree Town!

Text: 我们可以白天在护甲村表演……
OriginalText: We could perform days at Armor Town...

Text: ……而傍晚照着火炬光在树村表演！
OriginalText: ...And evenings by torchlight in Tree Town!

Text: 我也要！我准备享受真正的度假！
OriginalText: I'm in! I’m ready for a real vacation!

Text: 而也许这一次我能有个合适的房间！
OriginalText: And maybe I can get a decent room this time!

Text: 有我上台一定会很受欢迎的！
OriginalText: With me on stage we'll be a sure fire hit!

Text: 我的确想跟那些科学家继续聊聊！
OriginalText: I'd like to spend some time with those scientists!
I got to ride on an airship!

Text: 他们还给了我们用餐和送了免费小包包！
OriginalText: They gave us a meal and a free little bag!
My dad ran out of bags.

Text: 爸说海底有一艘泡泡铁船。
OriginalText: Dad said there is a metal bubble boat deep under the sea.
It is an up-and-down kind of boat.
Not a back-and-forth kind of boat.

Text: 它像是水中的爸妈房间一样神奇。
OriginalText: It's the Mom and Dad's room of water.
The old man on the beach...

Text: 他打呼时嘴巴张得大大的。
OriginalText: He snores with his mouth wide open.
The mommy seagull likes to feed him.

Text: 我读了一本关于大自然的书，提到乌龟！
OriginalText: I read a nature book about turtles!

Text: 他们是所有陆地哺乳类中最有破坏性的。
OriginalText: They are the most destructive of all land-based mammals.

Text: 它们捕爱吃<1>巨大、裂缝的方块</1>。
我读了一本关于大自然的书，提到青蛙！
OriginalText: I read a nature book about frogs!

Text: 青蛙一次只能转九十度的弯。
OriginalText: Frogs can only make 90 degree turns.

Text: 它们也有办法切换游泳速度。
OriginalText: They can also toggle their swimming speed somehow.

Text: 书里没有很仔细地解释这一点。
OriginalText: The book was not specific on this point.

Text: 我读了一本关于大自然的书，提到章鱼！
OriginalText: I read a nature book about octopi!

Text: 章鱼有四只脚，而不会游泳。
OriginalText: Octopi have four legs, and can not swim.

Text: 它们利用喷射墨水的方式在空中飞。
OriginalText: They fly through the air by firing ink.

Text: 它们可以在天空飞两次，而之后得触碰地上。
OriginalText: They can fly exacty two times before they must touch the ground again.

Text: 若章鱼跌下岩边，他不算在天空中。
OriginalText: If an octopus falls off a ledge, it is not considered to be in the air.
The laws of nature are super weird!
I'm going to be an airship pirate!

Text: 魔毯能防止飞船从天上落下来。
OriginalText: Magic carpets keep the airships from falling.

Text: 你就能吸起遥远的战利品！
OriginalText: You can suck up loot that's far away!
How do you even do that?

Text: 那包包辫子的女孩回来了！
OriginalText: The girl with poofy pigtails came back!

Text: 你身上的味道好像海滩日子哦！

OriginalText: I saw you with a boy.

Text: 那男孩有来这里找点心吃。
OriginalText: That same boy came here looking for snacks.

Text: 可是他又离开往<1>树村</1>去了。
OriginalText: But then he left for <1>TREE TOWN</1>.

Text: 你该注意你男朋友的下落。
OriginalText: Keep better tabs on your boyfriend.
I want to pat its head!

Text: 这里的商店卖很多常见的项目。
OriginalText: The shops here sell many familiar items.

Text: ……但也卖许多我从没见过的东西！
OriginalText: ...But also some things I've never seen before!

Text: 若你买个东西，我也来买个东西！
OriginalText: I'll buy something if you do!

Text: 有流言说沉没城市有闹鬼。
OriginalText: There's a rumor about the Sunken City being haunted.

Text: 可不可能消失的女孩就在那里？
OriginalText: Could the missing girls be down there?

Text: 想到就让我发鸡皮疙瘩！
OriginalText: The very thought of it gives me chills!

Text: 有人说先见者被古老生物拐走了！
OriginalText: They say that the Seer was taken by ancient creatures!

Text: 我为那些<1>铁鱼</1>里的科学家担心。
OriginalText: I worry for those scientists in the <1>METAL FISH</1>.

Text: 要探险那么深进未知的地方…
OriginalText: To travel so deep into the unknown...

Text: 他试着想让节目继续演下去……
OriginalText: He has tried to keep the show going...

Text: ……但我觉得他已经找不出新人才。
OriginalText: ...But I think he's finally run out of new talent.

Text: 也许我该给他看看我的竹扇舞！
OriginalText: Maybe it's time to show him my bamboo fan dance!

Text: 在护甲村有一位买怪兽卡的人。
OriginalText: In Armor Town there is a person who buys Monster Cards.

Text: 把没有用的怪兽卡卖掉也许能赚大钱哦！
OriginalText: Selling unused cards could mean big bucks!

Text: 我来自遥远的史卡托村！
OriginalText: I came here all the way from Scuttle Town!

Text: 我非常期待看半精灵准备给我们的表演！
OriginalText: I can't wait to see what kind of show the Half-Genies have in store for us!

Text: 我认为市长知道比他显示的多。
OriginalText: I think the Mayor knows more than he's letting on.

Text: 他大概只是不想造成大家惊慌。
OriginalText: He probably doesn't want to cause a panic.

Text: 今天早上我看到真难过的植物呢！
OriginalText: This morning I saw such a sad plant!

Text: 沉没城市里每一个<1>迷宫</1>里都藏了<1>三只爱心鱿鱼</1>，至少我是这么听说的！
OriginalText: Each <1>LABYRINTH</1> in the Sunken City hides <1>THREE HEART SQUIDS</1>, or so I'm told!

Text: 我刚才在头上顶了超过二十罐水壶！
OriginalText: I just balanced over twenty jugs on my head!

Text: 观众好像没有特别喜欢。

OriginalText: I guess I just don't have stage presence.

Text: 若你<1>震撼</1>个空房间，也许会有松的东西掉出来！
OriginalText: If you <1>SHAKE</1> an empty room, something loose might become dislodged!

Text: 那是什么轰隆的声音呢？
若你需要，干脆把全店买下来！
OriginalText: Buy everything in the store if you have to!
Step into the water and soak your worries away!

Text: 从昨天晚上之后，我太害怕做任何东西！
OriginalText: After last night, I'm too scared to do anything!

Text: 这药草温泉会让你感觉跟新的一样！
OriginalText: These herbal springs will make you feel good as new!

Text: 跳进水里把烦恼全部洗走！
OriginalText: Hop in and wash your cares away!

Text: 这些怪兽真是不让你休息……
OriginalText: Those monsters won't give you any rest...

Text: 在这舒缓的水里回复你的力气，好吗？
OriginalText: Recover your strength in these soothing waters, ok?

Text: 市长想大家准备好随时能疏散。
OriginalText: The mayor wants us all ready to evacuate at a moment's notice.

Text: 所以趁还有机会快享受个热乎乎的澡！
OriginalText: So enjoy a hot bath while you can!

Text: 你全身都是山洞探险和怪兽内脏的臭味！
OriginalText: You reek of cave exploration and monster guts!
It's time for your final battle!

Text: 烦忧，烦忧！真的没人能救我们吗？
OriginalText: Fret, fret! Can no one save us?
And if I refund all these people's money...
I beg you to remain in town!

Text: 你一定得保持安全，等着让我把事情搞清楚！
OriginalText: You must stay safe while I figure this out!
(Sounds like the Mayor is in over his head!)

Text: 岛屿的流言会是真的吗？
OriginalText: Could the rumors surrounding this island be true?

Text: 我已经试着联络大陆，没有用。
OriginalText: I've tried contacting the mainland to no avail.

Text: 我得想办法娱乐这些人。
OriginalText: I'll have to keep these folks entertained somehow.

Text: 至少直到节目回复起来。
OriginalText: At least until the scheduled pick up.

Text: 我希望你有在好好使用我 <1>先见者魔法</1> 。
OriginalText: I hope you're putting my <1>SEER MAGIC</1> to good use.

Text: 她像从来没有过的大姐姐。
OriginalText: She seems like the big sister I never had.

Text: 我救了其他人会再回来的！
OriginalText: I'll be back after I've rescued the others!

Text: 你又下去城市里了，是吗？
OriginalText: You went down into the city again, didn't you?

Text: 她被大纠缠的海蛇赛莲抓住了。
OriginalText: She was being held by a big tangled-up sea serpent Siren.

Text: 但我给那怪兽教训好了！
OriginalText: But I whipped that monster right into shape!

Text: 我来到这岛屿之前从来没见过她……
OriginalText: I'd never met her before coming to this island.

Text: 她好像对其他人有点戒惧。
OriginalText: She seems a teensy bit wary of others.

Text: 我想她也会对我们亲热起来的！
你不是说想惩罚阿谋尔男爵的罪吗？
OriginalText: What happened to punishing Armor Baron for his misdeeds?
That loser's not worth the time.

Text: 烦的要死的宅男比较是你的特长。
OriginalText: Frustrating nerds is more your kinda thing.

Text: 若是我，每次我救了一位半精灵就会接力给下一位。
OriginalText: If I were you, I'd tag out each time you rescue a Half-Genie.
It'd take a lot less work.
We believe that the best defense...
We believe that the best defense...

Text: 我们认为战斗最好的方式……
OriginalText: We believe that the best way to play a battle...
...is never to win in the first place!

Text: 你找出了岛屿上所有<1>爱心鱿鱼</1>了吗？
OriginalText: Have you found all of the <1>HEART SQUIDS</1> on this island?

Text: 跟鱿鱼匠说我拍你去的！
OriginalText: Tell the Squidsmith I sent you!

Text: 这岛屿上有<1>十四个隐藏山洞</1>。

OriginalText: Think you can find them all?

Text: 这岛屿上总共有<1>二十一只爱心鱿鱼</1>。
OriginalText: Have you found all <1>36 HEART SQUIDS</1>?

Text: 这岛屿上有<1>十四个隐藏山洞</1>。
你有找出全部<1>十四个隐藏山洞</1>吗？
OriginalText: Did you find all <1>14 SECRET CAVES</1>?
I used to forge toys for children.
But recently I can't keep up with the demand.

Text: 有一位巨大的章鱼买了我手工做的玩具。
OriginalText: A large octopus bought one of my handmade toys.

Text: 但他后来试着退回给我，把钱要回去。
OriginalText: But then he tried to return it to me, asking for his money back.

Text: 而我后来才注意到他把我手工做的玩具换成次等仿冒品。
OriginalText: Later I noticed that he had swapped my handmade toy for one of lesser quality.
What kind of crook does this?

Text: 它们很软，跟打造金属是相反的。
OriginalText: They are soft, which is the opposite of metal forging.

Text: 我们的部长，阿谋尔男爵，在上面的房间。
OriginalText: Our leader, the <1>ARMOR BARON</1>, is in the room up above.
The Armor Baron is a sensitive man.
If you slug him real hard...

Text: 有一些不死怪兽能被<1>治疗</1>。
你有试过使用<1>刷新舞</1>在怪兽上吗？
OriginalText: Have you tried using your <1>REFRESH DANCE</1> on monsters?

Text: 怪兽们会掉落许多种食物。
OriginalText: Monsters drop a variety of foods.

Text: 所有事物都能恢复健康。
但也有某种特殊食物能补充魔法！
OriginalText: But there are special kinds of food that also refill magic!
Our island has very few animals.
But it is abundant in edible monsters.

Text: 你的<1>震撼舞</1>能显露少见的奖品！
OriginalText: Your <1>QUAKE DANCE</1> could reveal rare treats!
Be sure to try it from time to time.
If I was an electric eel...
I would also be very slippery.

Text: 若我有一把巨大的锤子……
OriginalText: If I had a giant hammer...
I would use it to <1>SMASH THE GROUND</1>!

Text: 大概任何看起来可疑的地方吧。
你有看过岛屿上任何<1>雅观的雕塑</1>吗？
OriginalText: Have you seen the many <1>TASTEFUL STATUES</1> on the island?

Text: 那是因为他们都埋住了！
你能找出岛上所有<1>雅观的雕塑</1>吗？
OriginalText: Can you find all of the <1>TASTEFUL STATUES</1> on the island?

Text: 战斗时，身体护甲非常关键的！
OriginalText: Body armor is critical in battle!

Text: 应该从头到脚完全遮住勇士的身体。
OriginalText: It should cover a warrior from head to toe.

Text: 有一些种类能吸收，甚至反抗抛体！
OriginalText: There are types that absorb, or even repel projectiles!

Text: 那遥远的巨塔是什么啊？
OriginalText: What are those towers in the distance?

Text: 该换成我轻薄的护甲了。
OriginalText: Time to change into my light armor.

Text: 护甲村的护甲处处之名！
OriginalText: Armor Town is famous for its armor!

Text: 我们部长是阿谋尔男爵。
OriginalText: Our leader is the Armor Baron.

Text: 他认为岛屿据点提供最佳的防御。
OriginalText: He felt that an island stronghold offers the best defense.

Text: 不过当然，你也就是直接走进来的。
OriginalText: Of course, you just walked right in.

Text: 我们城市上面没有保护！这不太好！
OriginalText: Our town isn't shielded from above! This looks bad!

Text: 这几年来，我创造了许多风机叶片！
OriginalText: Over the years, I have crafted many fan blades!

Text: 人家从千里之外来看我在岛上到处建设的<1>巨大风机</1>。
OriginalText: People travel from miles around to view the <1>HUGE FANS</1> I've constructed all over this island.
That I had to create my own...

Text: 欣赏社的会员都会收到真品证书。
OriginalText: Admiration horde members get a certificate of authenticity.

Text: 我听说你修了我其中一个风机！
OriginalText: I heard that you repaired one of my fans!

Text: 大家都爱看我<1>最大的风机</1>重新自由旋转！
OriginalText: Everyone loves seeing my <1>BIGGEST FAN</1> spinning freely once more!

Text: 其实，有一位艺术家有来表现她的感谢……
OriginalText: In fact, an artist came by to show her appreciation...

Text: 她把写生簿拿出来而画出……
OriginalText: She got out her sketchbook and created...

Text: 请注意一下，所有提交提的欣赏涂鸦都会成为我欣赏社的资产。
OriginalText: Be aware that any admiration scrawl you submit becomes property of my admiration horde.

Text: 你也许已经知道了，我打造了许多巨大风机叶片！
OriginalText: As you may know, I have forged many huge fan blades!

Text: 而现在我巨大风机红的不得了。
OriginalText: And now my giant fans are more popular than ever.

Text: 说实在，前几天有一位作家来参观。
OriginalText: In fact, the other day an author stopped by.

Text: 他非常喜欢我的风机，甚至把它写到冒险故事里。
OriginalText: He liked my fans so much, that he wrote original adventures about them.

Text: 风机风机风机风机风机。
OriginalText: Fan fan fan fan fan fan fan fan fan.

Text: 有人说，每日洗个热澡能舒缓灵魂！
OriginalText: They say that a hot bath every day soothes the soul!
It's only good for your body.

Text: 因为那才是水会碰到的部分。
OriginalText: Because that's the part the water touches.

Text: 我正在准备加悄悄几滴薰衣草到澡池里。
OriginalText: I was just about to add a whisper of lavender to the bath.

Text: 我很荣幸为你加一点茉莉香的提示。
OriginalText: I'd be happy to add some notes of jasmine.
Please come pick up your box of stuff.

Text: 否则我就得丢到垃圾桶里。
OriginalText: Otherwise I'll be forced to toss it in the trash.
Make sure you scrub your nails!

Text: 请给我机会伸出橄榄枝。
OriginalText: Allow me to extend an olive branch.

Text: 我有一位买家破产了，所以因此……
OriginalText: One of my buyers went belly up, and as a result...

Text: ……我到手了全世界<1>最稀罕的赛莲卡</1>。
OriginalText: ...I came into the possession of the <1>MOST RARE SIREN CARD</1> of them all.

Text: 卖<1>九颗金块</1>，实在划算的不得了。
OriginalText: At a mere <1>9 NUGGETS</1>, it's a steal.
Come back when you have enough!

Text: 甚至这卡的名字也是有点破梗！
OriginalText: Even the name of this card is a bit of a spoiler!

Text: 你想交换<1>九颗金块</1>获取终极的<1>赛莲卡</1>吗？
OriginalText: Want to trade <1>9 NUGGETS</1> for the ultimate <1>SIREN CARD</1>?
The <1>EMPRESS SIREN CARD</1> is now yours!

Text: 下次再回来。我会在这儿。
OriginalText: Come on back. I'll be here.

Text: 这些塔一定表示我们完蛋了！
OriginalText: These towers must mean the end!
I heard you managed to rescue Harmony.
Heh. You're all right my book.
Those science guys were back again.

Text: 你应该去参观<1>铁鱼</1>看看到底是什么！
OriginalText: You outta hit up the <1>METAL FISH</1> and see what it is!

Text: 要不要交换<1>六金块</1>来获取独一无二的<1>赛莲卡</1>呢？
OriginalText: How 'bout <1>6 NUGS</1> for a one-of-a-kind <1>SIREN CARD</1>?

Text: 只用<1>六颗金块</1>，卡就是你的。同意吗？
OriginalText: Just <1>6 NUGGETS</1> and the card is yours. Deal?
Some dirty rat's been swipin' dollies.

Text: 我在注意观察那娃娃贼。
OriginalText: I'm keepin' my eyes peeled for that doll thief.
You know that whole doll fiasco?
Who ever heard of a doll thief?

Text: 村长恢复他原本的样子了！
OriginalText: The chief is back to his old self!

Text: 若你疗养一条<1>病茎</1>，也许好事会发生哦！
OriginalText: If you heal a <1>SICK STALK</1>, something nice might happen!

Text: 村长说村里的<1>水池</1>是禁地。
OriginalText: The chief says the <1>PONDS</1> in our village are off-limits.

Text: 我们必须拯救我们乡村！

OriginalText: You came back to check on us!

Text: 请参观我们<1>商店</1>里的项目!
OriginalText: Please check out the items in our <1>ITEM SHOP</1>!

Text: 请参观我们<1>商店</1>里的项目!
OriginalText: Please check out the items in our <1>ITEM SHOP</1>!

Text: 右边是我们新的<1>扭曲房</1>！
OriginalText: To the right is our new <1>WARP ROOM</1>.

Text: 我们希望能跟岛屿其他人民统一！
OriginalText: We wish to unite with the people of this island!

Text: 这岛屿上总共有<1>八间扭曲房</1>。
OriginalText: There are a total of <1>8 WARP ROOMS</1> on this island.
Three can be found on land.
The others must be hidden beneath the sea!

Text: 你试过了我们店里头发的产品吗？
OriginalText: Have you tried the hair products in our shop?

Text: 粘液被攻击时会变颜色。
你也许该试试跳个适合他们心情的舞。
OriginalText: Perhaps you should dance in a way that appeals to their current mood.

Text: 他在人生中雕刻了许多<1>雅观的雕塑</1>。
OriginalText: During his day he made many <1>TASTEFUL STATUES</1>.

Text: 很可惜，大部分的作品都被埋在土地下。
OriginalText: Sadly, most of his works are buried in the earth.
The <1>CHIEF</1> would like to see you.
The <1>CHIEF</1> would like to see you.
The chief's daughter has come home to us!

Text: 村长在探索收集怪兽卡。
OriginalText: The chief is trying Monster Card collecting.
I'm not... super sure that he's into it.

Text: 很久以前，有一位精灵保护着这岛屿。
OriginalText: Long ago a Genie protected this island.

Text: 传奇说，我们守护精灵为了救我们而牺牲了自己。
OriginalText: Stories say our Guardian Genie sacrificed herself to save us.

Text: 拜託，千万别让薇拉收到任何伤害！
OriginalText: Please, don't let Vera come to harm!

Text: 薇拉能使用她魔法把低垂的植物疗养好！
OriginalText: Vera can heal droopy plants with her magic!

Text: 若你舞跳得够好，也许能得到<1>心</1>！
OriginalText: If you're a good enough dancer, you might win a <1>HEART</1>!

Text: 矿山？爷爷说在我们底下！
OriginalText: Mines? Grandpa says they are beneath us!

Text: 我们岛屿到底在发生什么？
OriginalText: What is happening to our island?

Text: 岛屿像个蛋一样破开了！
OriginalText: The island broke open like an egg!

Text: 所以才会有个巨大的鸟飞出来！
OriginalText: That's why a giant steel bird flew out!

Text: 你怎么找到我们乡村呢？
薇拉说那些怪兽叫做赛莲。
OriginalText: Vera said the monsters are called Sirens.
I don't like Sirens very much.

Text: 我想看大家在讲的到底是什么。
OriginalText: I wanted to see what everyone was talking about.

Text: 所以我下去了绿色的舱口里。
OriginalText: So I went down into that green hatch.
I got pretty deep, at first...

Text: 结果有两块巨大、<1>裂缝的方块</1>挡住我的路。
OriginalText: Turns out there were big, <1>CRACKED BLOCKS</1> in my way.

Text: 可惜没有办法把它们砸碎。
OriginalText: Too bad there's no way to smash 'em.
At night, when everything is super quiet...

Text: 听起来好像有东西在我们脚底下挖着。
OriginalText: It sounds like something huge is digging around beneath our feet.

Text: 说不定怪兽就是从那儿出来的……
OriginalText: What if that's how those monsters come...
The town next door flew away!

Text: 我现在再不再喜欢蜥蜴了！

OriginalText: Grass skirts are not for me.

Text: 我穿只是为了讽刺而已。

OriginalText: Time to return this lizard to his home.
He lives in the little white sand dunes.

Text: 跟他老婆和孩子在那儿住。
OriginalText: There, with his wife and children.

Text: 所以这岛上的白沙丘都是自然保护区。
OriginalText: That's why all white sand dunes on this island are nature preserves.

Text: 我也许看起来很冷静，但我准备好随时都能跑。
OriginalText: I may look calm, but I'm ready to run.

Text: 我们大家都得逃到安全！
OriginalText: We should all get to safety!

Text: 因为我这里有一片<1>非常少见卡牌</1>给你。
OriginalText: Because I've got a <1>SUPER RARE CARD</1> for ya.

Text: 准备好把那<1>五金快</1>与我的<1>非常少见卡牌</1>交换吗？
OriginalText: Ready to trade those <1>FIVE NUGGETS</1> for my <1>SUPER RARE CARD</1>?
Blah. Come back when you have enough.

Text: 我给你的怪兽卡实在很棒。
OriginalText: The Monster Card I gave you is a real beauty.

Text: 你就会知道我的意思了。
我完全不喜欢这怪兽卡潮流。
OriginalText: I'm not at ALL into this Monster Card fad.

Text: 但我超爱所有跟洗澡主题有关的东西。
OriginalText: But I love anything bath themed.

Text: 我有张卡牌上有个正妹泡在章鱼液体脑中。
OriginalText: So I got this card featuring a rad babe soaking in a liquid octopus brain.

Text: 回头想，这对我而言其实太怪了。
OriginalText: In hindsight, this is just too strange for me.

Text: 若你有兴趣，我卖你<1>八颗金块</1>。
OriginalText: If you're interested, I'll sell it for <1>8 NUGGETS</1>.

Text: 我看你还缺了几颗金块，随时再回来！
OriginalText: I see that you're short on Nuggets, so come back whenever!

Text: 把我<1>赛莲卡</1>拿来交换你<1>八颗金块</1>？
OriginalText: Take my <1>SIREN CARD</1> in exchange for <1>8 NUGGETS</1>?
It's yours! Have fun with it.

Text: 这疗伤水来自高高的悬崖。
OriginalText: These healing waters come from the cliffs high above.

Text: 有人说是旅客哭的眼泪。
OriginalText: Some say the they are the tears of crying tourists.

Text: 那上面的房间真的那么差吗？
OriginalText: Are the rooms up there really that bad?

Text: 我们天然泉会振兴你全身。
OriginalText: Our natural springs will reinvigorate your entire body.

Text: 在未来，我们会确定所有宝宝都有包双层尿布。
OriginalText: In the future, we will double-diaper all toddlers.
If so, please let us know.

Text: 我们习惯把洗澡水卖给渔人。
OriginalText: We like to sell the used bathwater to the fishmans.

Text: 沉没城市的地真的崩溃了吗？
OriginalText: Is it true that the floor of the Sunken City Tour collapsed?

Text: 那一跌下去也真远……而也经过错觉墙壁呢！
OriginalText: That is a very long drop... and right past the illusion wall, no less!

Text: 你打最终战斗之前应该清洗一下。
OriginalText: You should clean up before your final battle!

Text: 这样输的话，至少闻起来是香喷喷。
OriginalText: If you lose, at least you'll smell nice.

Text: 我们人民非常骄傲我们<1>舞蹈技术</1>。
OriginalText: As a people, we take great pride in our <1>DANCE SKILLS</1>.

Text: 我们也非常骄傲我们<1>会计技术</1>。
OriginalText: We also take great pride in our <1>ACCOUNTING SKILLS</1>.

Text: 根据其中一个，我们创造了一个小游戏。
OriginalText: We have created a mini-game based on one of the two.

Text: 你该去试试看<1>掌握</1>舞池。
OriginalText: You should attempt to <1>MASTER</1> the dance floor.

Text: 我们预留了非常棒的奖品给最好的舞者！
OriginalText: There is one super awesome prize reserved for the very best!

Text: 我们乡村来的这一位新人是谁啊？
OriginalText: Who is this new guy in our village?

Text: 但她从被抓走之后就一直感觉<1>虚弱</1>。
OriginalText: But she is feeling <1>WEAK</1> since her capture.

Text: 巨塔从深深的地下出现了！
OriginalText: Large towers have appeared from deep underground!

Text: 我从来没感觉过那种震撼！
OriginalText: I've never felt tremors like that before!

Text: 真的很难相信她真的不在了。
OriginalText: It is hard to believe that she's really gone.

Text: 树村少了我们保护精灵，到底要怎么下去呢？
OriginalText: How will Tree Town get by without its Guardian Genie?

Text: 想啊，我们城市底下就住了一个赛莲！
OriginalText: To think there was a Siren living right below our town!

Text: 莲花赛莲、珊瑚赛莲、还有管虫赛莲？
OriginalText: A Water Lilly Siren, a Coral Siren, and a Tubeworm Siren?
Yes, I have heard of the <1>METAL FISH</1>.

Text: 真的可能有个秘密藏在海底<1>最深</1>的地方吗？
OriginalText: Could there really be a secret hiding at the <1>VERY BOTTOM</1> of the ocean?

Text: 我若是个青蛙，我就能<1>到处游泳</1>！
OriginalText: If I was a frog, I could <1>SWIM EVERYWHERE</1>!

Text: 这也许是你最后一次机会收集项目！
OriginalText: This might be your last chance to collect items!

Text: 我们一直都把沉没城市封闭住！
OriginalText: We keep the Sunken City sealed up, always!

Text: 我们害怕下面住的<1>东西</1>。
OriginalText: We fear the <1>THINGS</1> that live down there.

Text: 有一位穿的很整齐的先生走过这里不久。
OriginalText: A smartly dressed man passed this way recently.

Text: 他往离这里不远的<1>开通舱口</1>走。
OriginalText: He was headed for the <1>OPEN HATCH</1> not far from here.
It is on the opposite side of the island.

Text: 护甲村的部长充满魅力。
OriginalText: The leader of Armor Town is brimming with charisma.
Suddenly he slams his hand against the wall, blocking my path...

Text: 喔，原来只是个小小的蝎子！
OriginalText: Oh, he was just squashing a silly scorpion!
How long have you been standing there?!

Text: 他不过只是个痴迷上怪杰文化的大宅男。
OriginalText: He's just another big nerd obsessed with creepy geek culture.
So gross on so many levels.

Text: 我跟阿谋尔男爵有约会！
OriginalText: Got a date with the Armor Baron!

Text: （唱着又奇异，又充满探险精神的歌）
那上面飞来飞去的东西是什么啊？
OriginalText: What is that thing flying up above?

Text: 你面对管虫赛莲而救出了砸破？
OriginalText: You saved Zapple from a Tubeworm Siren?

Text: 请再留住我刷新的能力久一点。
OriginalText: Please, keep my <1>REFRESH</1> powers a little longer.
Use it to save the others!

Text: 我感觉我的力量都被消磨掉了。
OriginalText: I feel like my strength has been all sapped out.

Text: 薇拉也把我搞来玩这些怪兽卡。
OriginalText: Vera got me into these vile Monster Cards.
What is it supposed to be?

Text: 有个人物背后上背着虫。
OriginalText: Character with a bug on its back.

Text: 卡是应该拿来交换，对吗？
OriginalText: You're supposed to trade these away, right?

Text: 我想大概卖<1>十颗金块</1>吧。
看来你现在还不够金块。
OriginalText: Looks like you're short on Nuggets right now.

Text: 所以如何？给我<1>十颗金块</1>来交换这<1>奇怪卡牌</1>？
OriginalText: How about it? Give <1>10 NUGGETS</1> for this <1>ODD CARD</1>?

Text: 我不了解这些东西，但你好好玩吧！
OriginalText: I don't get these things, but have fun!

Text: 半精灵是这世界的礼物。
OriginalText: Half-Genies are a gift to this world.

Text: 是的，薇拉的妈妈是精灵。
OriginalText: Yes, Vera's mother was a Genie.

Text: 作为来自别领域的魔法生物的先生是不简单的！
OriginalText: It is not easy being the husband of a magical creature from another realm!

Text: 薇拉的妈妈能使用她魔法补充肌肉。
OriginalText: Vera's mother could replenish muscle using her magic.

Text: 因为这原因，我们两位都曾经很有力！
OriginalText: Because of this, we were both very powerful!

Text: 自从她回到精灵世界后，我的身体变了……
OriginalText: Since she returned to the Genie Realm, my body has become...

Text: 我保持希望有一天我们一家人会再次团结！
OriginalText: I have <1>HOPE</1> that we will be together as a family someday!

Text: 有一次我精灵太太身病了。
OriginalText: One time my Genie wife became sick.

Text: 她魔法感冒非常容易传染的。
OriginalText: Her magical cold was extremely contagious.

Text: 我自己也被传染到。而自从那瞬间后……
OriginalText: I caught it myself. And from that point on...
I was able to DO THIS!!

Text: 我大拇指不会真的掉啦。
OriginalText: My thumb does not really come off.

Text: 我们岛屿面对严重的危险。
OriginalText: Our island is in grave danger.

Text: 我还是对你能力有信心。
OriginalText: I have faith in your abilities.

Text: 嘿...你是其中一位表演者，不是吗？
OriginalText: Pssst... you're one of the performers right?

Text: 其他半精灵的耳朵也像你的。
OriginalText: The other Half-Genies have ears just like yours.

Text: 你找到一个巨植物小姐？
OriginalText: You fought a giant plant lady?

Text: 市长保证我们会有新的节目……
OriginalText: The mayor promised us a new show...

Text: 猴子骑着小狗对我来说不太有趣。
OriginalText: Monkey on saddle riding small dog must not be my thing.
That Half-Genie that made it back to town...

Text: 市长说没有办法联络到大陆！
OriginalText: Mayor says there's no way to contact the mainland!
What do we do if monsters show up?

Text: 坐在这里等待安排的接驳车？
OriginalText: Sit around and wait for the scheduled pickup?
I just want to go home!

Text: 半精灵真的把他们魔法给掉了吗？
OriginalText: Is it true that the Half-Genies gave their magic away?
Everyone here has their own remarkable story to tell!

Text: 让我想按<IB action=Subscreen/>来<1>跳过无聊的文字</1>。
OriginalText: It makes me want to <1>SKIP BORING TEXT</1> by pressing <IB action=Subscreen/>.

Text: 使我想按屏幕任何地方<1>跳过无聊的文字</1>。
OriginalText: It makes me want to <1>SKIP BORING TEXT</1> by pressing and holding anywhere on screen.

Text: 若你生命值低了，试试<1>澡堂</1>。
OriginalText: If you're low on health, try the <1>BATH HOUSE</1>.

Text: 会补充你全部的空心，让你感觉跟新的一样！
OriginalText: It will refill all of your empty hearts, and make you feel as good as new!

Text: 有一位奇特的小姐刚来到城市里！
OriginalText: An unusual woman just arrived in town!
You should <1>TALK TO HER</1> right away!

Text: 也许不是给我们去知道的。
OriginalText: Perhaps we aren't meant to know.

Text: 旅客曾经在树村海岸附近看过<1>鬼船</1>。
OriginalText: Vistors once saw a <1>GHOST SHIP</1> off the coast near Tree Town.

Text: 有人说它在作祟海底坟墓。
OriginalText: Some say it was haunting an undersea grave.

Text: 有可能真的有沉船在<1>西岸海床</1>吗？
OriginalText: Could there really be a sunken wreck on the <1>WESTERN SEA FLOOR</1>?

Text: 你有没有看过那些小小、像蝙蝠样的怪兽？
OriginalText: Have you seen those small, bat-like creatures?

Text: 我不觉得它们是受权的修理工。
OriginalText: I don't think they're authorized repair men.

Text: 有一部分的岛刚飞走了！
OriginalText: Part of the island just flew away!!!

Text: 好的！！半精灵真是好玩。我爱她们！
OriginalText: YESSSS! Half-Genies are just nuts. I love 'em.
Their moms are genies, and their dads are human.
They've all got stupid weird powers.

Text: 而且所有半精灵都是女的。
妳在家乡是一位<1>保护精灵</1>，不是吗？
OriginalText: You're a <1>GUARDIAN GENIE</1> back home, right?

Text: 妳一定得找出那些女孩！
OriginalText: You've got to find those lost girls!
It's like your duty, or somethin'!
Where in the world is <1>TREE TOWN</1>?

Text: 我已经看了<1>西边的海岸线</1>，可是那里什么都没有。
OriginalText: I checked the <1>WEST SHORELINE</1>, but there's nothing over there.
At least, nothing I can see.
He should make good on his promise!

Text: 有人快去把半精灵带回来！
跟他们说戏还得继续演下去！
OriginalText: Tell them that the show must go on!

Text: 这么多震撼到底是发生了什么事？

OriginalText: Was that part of the show?
Is this some kind of air show?

Text: 好。你是我看见到达的第六个半精灵。
OriginalText: Ok. You are the sixth Half-Genie I've seen arrive.
Oh, and the tall serious one.
So cool. You are definitely in my top four.
The other Half-Genies have gone missing!
You know what that means, right?

Text: 妳现在就是我最喜欢的！
每个山洞也许含着宝贵的宝藏！
OriginalText: Every cave could hold a valuable treasure!
Eventually it can even become poisonous!

Text: 真的没有办法把它<1>净化</1>吗？
OriginalText: Is there really no way to <1>PURIFY</1> it?

Text: 但是，<1>鬼沉船</1>也许就值得去参观。
OriginalText: But, a <1>SUNKEN GHOST SHIP</1> would be worth checking out.

Text: 那边穿绿洋装的小姐好像了解更多。
OriginalText: That lady in the green dress over there seems to know all about it.

Text: 除了病恹恹的半精灵，其他都找出来了吗？
OriginalText: All but the sickly Half-Genie were found?

Text: 你找出了所有半精灵啊？
OriginalText: You found all of the Half-Genies?

Text: 这表示节目又能开始了吗？
OriginalText: Does this mean the show's back on?

Text: 哎呀，情况看起来不好了！
什么时候才会有人来把这行李拿走？
OriginalText: When is someone going to move this luggage?
I want to see more of the island!

Text: 我终于能参观岛屿的<1>东岸</1>！
OriginalText: Finally, I can see the <1>EAST SIDE</1> of the island!

Text: 有人说<1>西桥</1>上有一块<1>大片漏洞</1>。
OriginalText: They say there's a <1>WIDE GAP</1> in the <1>WEST BRIDGE</1>.

Text: 我年轻时，我想我能<1>快冲</1>过去！
OriginalText: In my younger days, I bet I could've <1>DASHED</1> across!

Text: 有没有导游团回去<1>护甲村</1>呢？
OriginalText: Is there a tour group that goes to <1>ARMOR TOWN</1>?

Text: 我听说在<1>东边高原</1>上面。
OriginalText: I hear it's up on the <1>EASTERN PLATEAU</1>.

Text: 我想试穿他们有名的身体护甲，趁还没长太大的时候！
OriginalText: I want to try on some of their famous body armor before I grow too old!
<1>ARMOR TOWN</1> is just beyond this bridge.

Text: 我真希望我能游到海底<1>最低</1>的部分！
OriginalText: I wish I could swim to the <1>VERY BOTTOM</1> of the ocean!
I would look up at the sky, and say...

Text: 哇，我从这里能看得见两座巨塔！
OriginalText: Ooh! I can see two of those big towers from here!

Text: 我踏上了寻求而获得了宝石！
OriginalText: I went on a quest and got gems!

Text: 我们有空应该来交换一下！
还有签名过的九等級超级追逐传奇，我老爷爷给我的。
OriginalText: And signed 9 Grade mint banned foil Ultra chase Legendaries I got from my stinky ol' gramps.

Text: 我绝对不会卖我的怪兽卡！
OriginalText: I would never sell my Monster Cards!
Although, I am short on cash.

Text: 我在家被称为怪兽卡冠军。
OriginalText: At home, I'm a Monster Card Champion.

Text: 我秘密就是把我卡牌放进精品套。
OriginalText: My secret is to store my decks in premium sleeves.
I write on the back of each sleeve using a tiny pen.

Text: 这岛上又有另外一个爱交换金块，收集怪兽卡的人？
OriginalText: There's another Nugget-trading Monster Card Collector on this island?
I'm not a-scared of the dark.
...I'd use the power of <1>ELECTRICITY</1> to light a bulb.

Text: 岛屿上藏了二十个<1>雅观雕塑</1>。
OriginalText: There are 20 <1>TASTEFUL STATUES</1> hidden on this island!

Text: 真希望有办法让他们再次<1>升</1>起来！
OriginalText: If only there was a way to make them <1>RISE</1> once more!

Text: 那些塔在收集太阳的维他命D。
OriginalText: The towers are collecting vitamin D from the sun.

Text: 因此，岛屿就会变非常健康。
OriginalText: As a result, the island will become super healthy.

Text: 但我把我全部卡卖给<1>护甲村</1>里碰到的一些人。
OriginalText: But I sold my card collection to some dudes from <1>ARMOR TOWN</1>.
I'll trade you it for nuggets.

Text: 给我带来<1>五金块</1>卡就送给妳。
OriginalText: Bring me <1>FIVE NUGGETS</1> and it's yours.

Text: 在<1>子屏幕</1>上能装备使用。
你准备要交换时再回来。
OriginalText: Come back when you are ready to trade.

Text: 我想尝试炸巧克力大蒜手指炸弹！
OriginalText: I want to try the deep fried choco-dipped garlic finger bombs!

Text: 我若像妳一样有个<1>地图</1>，我会经常查看我的<1>子屏幕</1>!
OriginalText: If I had a <1>MAP</1> like yours, I'd be checking the <1>SUBSCREEN</1> all the time!

Text: 妳若找到那些爱心形状的鱿鱼…
OriginalText: If you find any of those heart-shaped squid things...

Text: ...城市里有位小姐能把它捣烂。
OriginalText: ...There's a lady in town who mushes them up.

Text: 那位僵尸精灵去哪儿呢？
OriginalText: What happened to that zombie genie?

Text: 有人把他的<1>梅尔巴吐司</1>掉在地上了。
OriginalText: Someone dropped their <1>MELBA TOAST</1> on the ground.

Text: 然后市长不下心就踩到了。
OriginalText: Then that mayor man accidentally stepped on it.

Text: 好像有一位章鱼人在到处乱跑。
OriginalText: I guess there's some kind of octopus man runnin' around.
Monsters are going to get us!!
The island was a flying ship!
This is the <1>ANGLER FISH SIREN</1> Monster Card!

Text: 你知道啊，就是那看起来很诡异的那一个。
OriginalText: You know, the creepy ghostly looking one.

Text: 若想要这<1>赛莲卡</1>，我算你<1>七颗金块</1>。
OriginalText: To get this <1>SIREN CARD</1>, I'll charge ya <1>7 NUGGETS</1>.
You don't have enough Nuggets yet, kiddo!
Looks like you have plenty on hand.

Text: 想要给我<1>七颗金块</1>来交换鮟鱇鱼赛莲吗？
OriginalText: Want to trade me <1>7 NUGGETS</1> for the Angler Siren?

Text: 好吧，随时都能回来找我！
他们说游客经常会消失。
OriginalText: They say travelers often go missing from this island.

Text: 这也许不是第一次发生的。
OriginalText: This might not be an isolated occurence.

Text: 我看到一位帅<1>男子气概的典范</1>。
OriginalText: I saw a hunky <1>PARAGON OF MANLINESS</1>.
He was heading to the <1>FAR WEST BRIDGE</1>.

Text: 现在暂时没办法离开岛屿。
OriginalText: There's no way off this island for now.

Text: 我想我就试着找好玩的事来做吧！
OriginalText: Guess I'll just try to have fun in the meantime!

Text: 你可以给机器=<1>休克</1>一下来引起它启动！
OriginalText: You could activate a machine by giving it an electric <1>SHOCK</1>!

Text: <1>震撼地</1>的能力也许有一天能帮你开阔死角！
OriginalText: The power to <1>SHAKE THE EARTH</1> could one day open up dead ends!

Text: 我不喜欢这些巨大珠子东东的样子！
OriginalText: I don't like the look of these giant pillar things!

Text:
欢迎来到
<1>桑塔与七赛莲</1>样板！
OriginalText:
Welcome to the 
<1>Shantae and the Seven Sirens</1> prototype!

Text: 在这演示版内，可以跑、跳、闪开和爬。
OriginalText: In this demo, you can make me run, jump, duck, and crawl.

Text: 我也可以用头发甩怪兽！
OriginalText: I can also whip monsters with my hair!

Text:
我们任务是找出隐藏在迷宫里的
<1>魔法能力</1>！
OriginalText:
Our task is to find the 
<1>MAGICAL ABILITY</1> that's hidden inside this labyrinth!

Text:
我们来寻找，直到
<1>找到</1>了!
但你到底怎么来到这里呢？
OriginalText: But... how in the world did you get up here?
Please, you've got to save me!
Let me out of here right now!

Text: 你不再能干扰我的计划了！
OriginalText: You've interfered with my plans for the last time!
Best to keep you under lock and key.
What have you done with the Mayor?
I haven't done ANYTHING with him!

Text: 这整个时间，市长就是你？！
OriginalText: YOU were the mayor ALL ALONG?!

Text: 是瑕疵才真的表现出人物特色，你不这么觉得吗？
OriginalText: It's the imperfections that make the character, don't you agree?

Text: 好几年前，我就发现了这岛屿。
OriginalText: Years ago I discovered this island.

Text: 还有船，埋在深深的土地理。
OriginalText: And the ship, buried deep underground.
A vessel fit for a queen!
I simply HAD to have it!

Text: 那时候，我就遇到了皇后。
你在讲的是第七个赛莲！
OriginalText: You're talking about the Seventh Siren!

Text: 她曾经遇到了精灵，被打败成无法像其他赛莲一样捕食。
OriginalText: She'd had a run in with the Genies, and robbed of her physical form.

Text: 所以我跟她谈出了协议！
OriginalText: So, I offered her a deal!

Text: 一个安排……同时给我们两位各有利益！
OriginalText: An arrangement... that would benefit both of us!

Text: 你真的没有食言，靴子船长。
OriginalText: You were good as your word, Captain Boots.
I take it that Ghost Genie's <1>SPELL IS BROKEN</1>?

Text: 就像我赛莲姐妹一样，我再次能捕食人类了。
OriginalText: Like my Siren sisters, I can feed on mortals once more.
I will live forever and beyond!
...and prepare to escort the Empress back to her island at once!

Text: 我会自己处理这半精灵小子。
OriginalText: I will dispose of this Half-Genie runt myself.
I have an even better idea.
What would you say to a new deal?
Now THIS is more like it!
What have you DONE to RISKY?!

Text: 只是一点我自己的融合魔法！
OriginalText: Just a little <1>FUSION MAGIC</1> of my own!
I'm going to drain the life force...
...of EVERY LIVING THING ON THAT ISLAND...

Text: 再把它从地图上完全爆炸掉！
OriginalText: BLOW IT CLEAN OFF THE MAP!

Text: 我该把这身体拿去实验驾驶一下！
OriginalText: It's time to take this body for a test drive!
You are stronger than I was led to believe.

Text: 我干脆使用我全部的力量来！
OriginalText: I'll simply use <1>ALL OF MY POWER</1>!

Text: 你怎么可能把我打败呢？！
瑞士起从开始就把你骗了。
OriginalText: Risky Boots had you fooled from the beginning.

Text: 她看起来像很大的麻烦。

OriginalText: It's time to take your <1>MAGIC</1> back!

Text: <1>使用你魔法</1> 把她偷走的<1>生命力</1>召唤回来！
OriginalText: ...<1>USE YOUR MAGIC</1> to call back the <1>LIFE FORCE</1> she stole from you!

Text: 你吸收的不是每一位都是半精灵。
OriginalText: Not everyone you fed on was a Half-Genie.

Text: 你的新身体中心是<1>腐烂</1>的！
OriginalText: Your new body was <1>ROTTEN</1> to the core!

Text: 没有冒犯你的意思，若地拖。

OriginalText: You should watch what you EAT!

Text: 因为半精灵生命力被<1>中毒了</1>！
OriginalText: Because the Half-Genie Life Force was <1>POISONED</1>!
You kinda get used to it.

Text: 永久的生命本来是我的！

OriginalText: The ship took too much damage!

Text: 皇后跟瑞士起融合起了。
OriginalText: The Empress drained Risky's life force...

Text: 既然皇后现在被毁灭掉了，也许她～
OriginalText: With the Empress destroyed, maybe she -

Text: 瑞士起不可能还活下去！
OriginalText: Risky Boots could not have survived!
We don't know that for sure!

Text: 若甚至有小小的机会她还活着，我必须把她找出来！
OriginalText: If there's even a chance that she's alive, I have to find her!
Go. I will see to the others.

Text: 我拿着可爱的小爱心鱿鱼…
OriginalText: I take adorable little <1>HEART SQUIDS</1> and...

Text: 准备好锻造一些生命心容器吗？
来吧！你最满生命值容量增加了一分！
OriginalText: There! Your <1>MAX HEARTS</1> have increased by one!
Would you like to <1>SAVE YOUR PROGRESS</1>?
A place to peruse for things you can use!
Step into the water to soak your worries away!

Text: 哼！看来像这东东没电了。
OriginalText: Huh! Looks like this doo-hickey is out of power.
This thing looks all worn out.

Text: 我现在应该就能把这修理起来了！
OriginalText: I should be able to fix this now!

Text: 现在就只需要加点<1>电力</1>！
OriginalText: Now all it needs is some <1>POWER</1>!

Text: 请踏上任何平台<1>扭曲走</1>!
OriginalText: Please step on any platform to <1>WARP AWAY</1>!

Text: 请踏上任何平台<1>扭曲走</1>!
OriginalText: Please step on any platform to <1>WARP AWAY</1>!

Text: 我们待会儿还有时间聊天。
OriginalText: We'll have time to talk soon.
For now, please report to the Mayor!
Want to try the dancing game?

Text: 你跳的真棒！我们来聊一聊吧！
OriginalText: You've got great moves!  Let's talk!
The <1>DANCE PARLOR</1> is open to all!

Text: 花<1>十颗宝石</1>来测试你的技巧？
抱歉，你没有足够的宝石！
谁把我的<1>布烂松娃娃</1>拿走了？

OriginalText: It sure didn't wander off by itself!

Text: 谁拿走我的<1>布烂松娃娃</1>？
那是我的<1>布烂松娃娃</1>吗？我可以拿回去吗？
OriginalText: Is that my <1>BRAN-SON DOLL</1>? Can I have it?

Text: 好耶！<1>布烂松</1>回来了，宝贝！
我不知道我怎么会有这呆呆的东西。
OriginalText: Somehow I ended up with this doofy thing.

Text: 我的布兰松娃娃会跟死神鬼战斗！
OriginalText: My Bran-Son doll battles against the Grim Reaper's Ghost!

Text: 不对！这娃娃一定是别人的！
OriginalText: Nope! This doll must belong to someone else!
There is a thief in our midst!

Text: 我找不到我<1>被口水沾到的娃娃</1>！
还有什么人会想要那么肮脏、旧的东西？
OriginalText: Who besides me would even want such a gross old thing?

Text: 我找不到我<1>被口水沾到的娃娃</1>！

OriginalText: A doll! Can I have it?
But I want it! I want it!
Great, let's take a look at it...

Text: 对啊，那就是我的<1>被口水沾到的娃娃</1>！

OriginalText: I'm kind of a heavy sleeper.

Text: 我之前找到这肌肉男人的玩具。
OriginalText: I found this muscle man toy earlier.

Text: 只剩下几个小时就能睡午觉了，对不对，<1>被口水沾到的娃娃</1>？
OriginalText: Only a few more hours 'till nap time, right <1>DROOL-STAINED DOLL</1>?

Text: 糟糕了，这不是我的娃娃！
OriginalText: Oh no, this is not my doll!

Text: 我好像掉了我的<1>壮男娃娃</1>。
OriginalText: I seem to have misplaced my <1>RUGGED MANLY PLUSH</1>.
If you see it, please return it.

Text: 虽然我一点也都不需要它！
OriginalText: Not that I need it at all!

Text: 你有个娃娃！我可以拿去吗？
OriginalText: You have a doll! Can I have it?

Text: 是的，这是我的<1>壮男玩偶</1>！
OriginalText: Yes, this is my <1>RUGGED MANLY PLUSH</1>!

Text: 请帮我丢掉那<1>恐怖娃娃</1>！

OriginalText: It was upsetting my Mister Buttons!
This is not my <1>RUGGED MANLY PLUSH</1>!
This way is blocked! But here...
I was able to salvage that for you!

Text: 我希望我们都能活到看这一切结束！
OriginalText: I hope we all live to see the end of this!
This way is blocked! But here...
I was able to salvage that for you!

Text: 我希望我们都能活到看这一切结束！
OriginalText: I hope we all live to see the end of this!
This way is blocked! But here...
I was able to salvage that for you!

Text: 我希望我们都能活到看这一切结束！
OriginalText: I hope we all live to see the end of this!
This way is blocked! But here...
I was able to salvage that for you!

Text: 我希望我们都能活到看这一切结束！
OriginalText: I hope we all live to see the end of this!

Text: 很高兴认识到你，收藏家同胞！
OriginalText: Nice to meet you, fellow collector!

Text: 我？我是一位<1>怪兽卡经销商</1>！
你知道你口袋剩下的那一堆散乱卡牌？
OriginalText: You know all those messy, leftfover cards just filling up your pockets?
I'll purchase those things for cold, hard cash!

Text: 你还是能<1>保留有用的卡牌</1>给自己使用。
OriginalText: You'll still <1>KEEP ALL THE USEFUL CARDS</1> for yourself.

Text: 我也愿意免费帮你评价！
OriginalText: I'll even appraise your collection for free!

Text: 按照你当前多出卡牌的数量和稀罕……
OriginalText: Based on the current quanity and rarity of your extraneous cards...
I can give you <1>%s gems</1>! What do you say?

Text: 没有什么比得上修剪过，有效的卡牌收藏！
OriginalText: There's nothing quite like a pruned and potent card collection!

Text: 以后想清除掉一些多出来的怪兽卡就再来找我！
OriginalText: Visit me again if you want to rid yourself of superfluous Monster Cards!

Text: 连一张备用的卡都没有！
OriginalText: Not a spare card to be found!

Text: 若再次有多出不用的卡，再来找我吧！
OriginalText: Visit me again if you wind up with Monster Cards you don't need!

Text: 这坑目前禁止通过，由于我们正在进行生活品质修理。
OriginalText: This pit is strictly off limits while we conduct quality of life repairs.

Text: （现在你该趁机会看看下面有些什么！）
OriginalText: (Now's your chance to see what's down there!)
